meanings: (정보·소식 등을) let sb know, inform; (통보하다) notify, report
let sb know beforehand[ahead of time, in advance]
as I let you know last time

vlive.korean: 뭔지 댓글로 알려줄 수 있나요? - 백만! Can you tell us what it is? - A million! 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: Can you tell us what it is? - A million!

vlive.korean: 제가 제 웃음소리에 관한 에피소드를 하나 알려드릴까요? Can I tell you a story about my laugh? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: Can I tell you a story about my laugh?

vlive.korean: 비 올 때 자주 듣는 노래 알려달라고요? "What's your favorite song you listen to on rainy days?" 듣기 View video ITZY : [ #채령 ] 령채의 목요일💕
vlive.english: "What's your favorite song you listen to on rainy days?"

vlive.korean: "콘택트렌즈 도수 알려주세요" 이건 신선한... "What's your contact lens prescription?" This is new. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 웃지마요 찍찍🐭
vlive.english: "What's your contact lens prescription?" This is new.

vlive.korean: "주헌아 다섯 곡 느낌만이라도 알려줄 수 있어요?" "JOOHONEY, can you tell me the vibe of the 5 songs?". 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 듣고 싶은 거 말해바바ㅎㅎ
vlive.english: "JOOHONEY, can you tell me the vibe of the 5 songs?".

examples.korean: Road markings indicate where you can stop. 발음듣기 도로 표시가 정차할 수 있는 곳을 알려준다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Road markings indicate where you can stop. 발음

examples.korean: The officer briefed her on what to expect. 발음듣기 경찰관이 그녀에게 예상되는 일에 대해 알려주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The officer briefed her on what to expect. 발음

examples.korean: Toot your horn to let them know we’re here. 발음듣기 경적을 울려서 그들에게 우리가 도착했다는 걸 알려. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Toot your horn to let them know we’re here. 발음

examples.korean: Police refused to divulge the identity of the suspect. 발음듣기 경찰이 용의자의 신원을 알려주기를 거부했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Police refused to divulge the identity of the suspect. 발음

examples.korean: The pharmacist will advise which medicines are safe to take. 발음듣기 약사에게 자문하면 어느 약이 복용하기에 안전한지 알려줄 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The pharmacist will advise which medicines are safe to take. 발음
